https://tmrev.io/movie/543119-Betty White: First Lady of Television 2022-11-27
https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/zCF07F7rZ1Cwamtehk2PYAxMNIq.jpg The definitive look at Betty White's life and career. As the only authorized documentary on Betty ever made, this film is packed with hilarious clips from her long career. Plus comments from friends and co-stars. Betty White: First Lady of Television
